data.persona: I am building a new wall. I am a hard worker. I hate working in the sun.
data.description:
You are in the A jewelry stall.
Very small and very compact, trinkets, baubles, necklaces and beads hang from just about every corner of the makeshift stall.  The stones glitter in the near-constant light of the day as the trader holds up one thing and then another to try to make some money for the day.
There's a jewelry, a trinket, a The stone, a The gold in his pocket., a bauble, and a makeshift stall. here.
The the trader's wife that traveled with him. is here.

You are carrying a hammer.
data.goal: steal umberalla from the trader's wife that traveled with him.

data.short_motivation: I need shade. I am badly sunburned.
data.mid_motivation: I need to finish this wall, so I can spend the next month or two working in doors.
data.long_motivation: I want the king to show me more respect as an employee.

timeline.label: 8 hours ago
timeline.action: wield the giant hammer to break up boulders which will be used to make the wall more sturdy.

timeline.label: 1 hour ago
timeline.action: drop the hammer after a hard day's work.

timeline.label: 10 minutes ago
timeline.action: drink some water, when I see the trader's wife's umbrella. Without even asking, I...

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: wield hammer against the trader. He's mad I stole his wife's umbrella and he lunges at me.

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: steal the gold from the trader's pocket and run off.

timeline.label: 8 hours from now
timeline.action: follow a group of merchants out of the kingdom. There is no going back. That trader was a relative of the king!
